title: Decision Status
description: Valid status values and their transition rules for Continuum Decisions.

x-status-descriptions.draft: The decision is being authored and is not yet in effect. All fields are mutable.
x-status-descriptions.active: The decision is in effect and being enforced. Core fields become immutable.
x-status-descriptions.superseded: The decision has been replaced by a newer decision.
x-status-descriptions.archived: The decision is no longer relevant and is retained for historical purposes only.

x-transition-descriptions.draft -> active: Decision is approved and takes effect.
x-transition-descriptions.active -> superseded: A new decision replaces this one.
x-transition-descriptions.superseded -> archived: Superseded decision is archived for cleanup.
